marklogic.body: The companies or individuals which mass purchase domain names are not the "little guy" - generally they're foreign interest groups or outright dishonest citizens, and as often as not these sites pose very real threats to user security and stability. The above mentioned site did not function as anything besides a sinkhole - a Spot in which a person might accidentally tread. Better that it sees some good use by an honest (err if Hollywood counts) business venture.
